---
title: "protocol_23"
---

Protocol_23.m  - test different contrast values for ON and OFF bars
Based on protocol 19
Includes:
- ALL OFF interval frame.
- 8 pixel ON and OFF bar fixation - 180 deg apart
----- varying contrast values (2, 4, and 6)

## Protocol Parameters

| Parameter | Value |
|:----------|:------|
| Conditions | 2 |
| Patterns Used | 2 |
| t_acclim | 20s |
| t_pause | 0.015 |


## Conditions

| # | Pattern | Speed | Duration | Description |
|--:|:--------|------:|---------:|:------------|
| 1 | [Pattern 45](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_45.qmd) | 9 | -s | bar fixation - 16px ON |
| 2 | [Pattern 46](../patterns/freely_walking_pattern_46.qmd) | 9 | -s | bar fixation - 16px OFF |
